    • Uses of Army in actor

      Fields in actor declared as Army 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Army Actor.armyAllegiance
      Used to assist in finding nearest opposing Actor; this ActorArmy search the opposing Army, thus the Army will need to know who the opposing Army is, but that's the Army responsibility.
      Methods in actor with parameters of type Army 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Actor ActorFactory.Type.create(Army armyAllegiance)
      Polymorphic method that will bind to the specific create() method for the actual named type (e.g.
      static Actor ActorFactory.createActorRandomSelection(Army armyAllegiance)
      Method that will select one of the available Actor types, create an object of that type and return a reference-to that object.
      void Actor.setArmyAllegiance(Army army) 
      Constructors in actor with parameters of type Army 
      Constructor and Description
      Actor(int subclassCount, Army armyAllegiance)
      Actor constructor is used when building Actor objects automatically: strength, health, speed fields are given randomly generated values within their range; name is given a sequentially numbered name: Auto:n where n is the sequence number.
      Elf(Army armyAllegiance)
      Supports the generation of random values for automatically created objects.
      Hobbit(Army armyAllegiance)
      Supports the generation of random values for automatically created objects.
      Orc(Army armyAllegiance)
      Supports the generation of random values for automatically created objects.
      Wizard(Army armyAllegiance)
      supports the generation of random values for automatically created objects.
